Use a pen: Invent a device that looks like a pen, but instead of writing with ink, it leaves an invisible mark on paper that can be seen with a special light.
Use a stylus: Draw with a stylus on a special type of paper that reacts to the stylus's touch, leaving a visible mark.
Use a laser pointer: Use a laser pointer to draw on a special type of paper that reacts to the laser's touch, leaving a visible mark.
Use a voice recorder: Record your thoughts and ideas using a voice recorder and transcribe them onto paper.
Use a touch screen: Draw with your fingers on a touch screen device that can record your gestures and translate them into written text.
